detail_desc: Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with raglan sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Gathers at the neckline and concealed hook-and-eye fastenings at the top.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave containing glittery threads. Round neckline with narrow ties at the front and a V-shaped opening at the top. Long balloon sleeves with a gathered seam at the top and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt under the bust and a skirt with a gathered seam at the hem. Lined with a V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jacket in a marled cotton knit with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen and a s split shoulder strap on one shoulder.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a wide neckline and a deep V-neck and gently draped wrapover at the back.
Calf-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. Glittery elastic waistband and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
One-shoulder top in slub jersey made from a cotton blend with one short sleeve and a straight-cut hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in a soft, organic cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, concealed press-studs at the crotch and short legs with narrow elastication at the hems.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Cotton cap with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a wool weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Oversized trousers in twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly, side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and wide, tapered legs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and an additional longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short cap sleeves and elastication at the back of the waist.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Sleeveless wrapover top in a patterned weave with a deep, flounced V-neck front and back, ties at one side and a concealed press-stud at the front.
Fully lined, textured bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket. Long legs with a tab and button.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long sleeves, cuffs with a covered button, and a seam at the waist with a knot detail at one side and elastication at the back.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly with a button, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. The shorts are made partly from recycled cotton.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam and flounce at the hem.

Studio Collection. Dress in an airy, pleated weave made from recycled polyester with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a horizontal strap at the back. Wide fit with gathered, elasticated seams. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in an airy, textured knit with a slightly wider, roll-edge neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Body in stretch crushed velvet with a push-up bra. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Low-cut back. Lined gusset.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.

Chino shorts in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Fitted polo-neck top in stretch, ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.

Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine-knit, ribbed cashmere with 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short, A-line suede skirt with side pockets and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and adjustable braces with a concealed fastening at the front.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with studs around the front of the neckline.

Long blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length trousers in crinkled organic cotton with an elasticated paper bag waist that has a decorative tie detail with glittery tassels. Straight, wide legs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a fine-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small frill trim around the neckline and ties at the top. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and a seam under the bust that is elasticated at the back.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Shorter-style hoodie in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High collar at the front with a chunky, long zip and a lined hood with a knotted drawstring. Slightly shorter at the front and a vertical seam down the back. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with covered block heels and a soft shaft with a zip in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Jumper in a textured knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with seams at the knees.
Short-sleeved blouse in airy viscose jersey with a tie detail at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and wide sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a decorative chiffon bow at the top and short puff sleeves.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Wide dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Decorative frills around the neckline, on the front and sleeves and at the hem, and flounced cuffs. Jersey underdress.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with elasticated hems. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with ties at the back of the neck.
